Today, Cornwall is lighting up with solid surf! North spots like Crantock and Fistral are both offering 4ft @ 10s W with light SSE winds, making for clean conditions. The South is also looking good, with Porthcurno and Praa Sands showing 4ft @ 9s SW, perfect for a fun session. Over on the West, Sennen Cove and Gwenvor are peaking at 6ft @ 9s SW, providing some exciting waves. Best: today.
